GenAiPlugin.description: Verify stock levels of electrical equipment. This topic is chosen when users need to check the availability of specific products.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the query is about product availability, use IdentityCopilot__SummarizeConnectedApp.
Provide accurate and up-to-date information on stock levels.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only verify and provide information on the availability of electrical equipment. This includes checking stock levels and informing users of current availability.
